storyInfo: For the Radiant Knight, her second championship title is but another starting line. Before she can change Kazimierz, however, she must first make some changes to herself.

attributes.content: Margaret.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Huh... Aunt Zofia? Sorry, I'm a bit busy and didn't hear you come in.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: When's the last time you got some sleep?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Be honest with me.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I'm not trying to hide anything from you. I just... don't actually remember.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I didn't expect to be this busy after winning the championship. I left in a hurry last time, so I didn't actually experience any of this.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You are the champion of the Major after all. All eyes turn to you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The other champions–– Actually, even the semifinalists, have whole professional teams around them to help with this stuff.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You shouldn't shoulder this all alone. Maria and I are here, and now that the games are over, we'll do everything we can to support you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I understand. I'm very glad to have you here too.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Then let me help. You can't even see the sunset with that thick stack of documents in front of you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Haha, I feel a lot better about myself now.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hmm... Looks like these are almost all business opportunities.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I reject most of them.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: As for the rest...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Let me have a look.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Speaking at a school? I'm sure you'd be glad to share your experiences with children.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: A press conference for health products? Did this company cooperate with Rhodes Island during the Major? Would you consider talking to them?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I'll have to think about it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I know what you're thinking.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If you take this first step... What about the next step?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Right. I've been more and more worried about that...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Major was only a starting point.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Nearl!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Operator Ivy? Did you run into trouble with your mission?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: No, we're doing alright... But there is trouble with another group.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It's a group of Infected. As you know, the Kawalerielki Alliance just disbanded, and they...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I know. Give me the location, and I'll head there right away.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Step aside! Let us into the city! You... You can't do this to us!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Please, honorable knight! We'll die if you leave us out in the wastes!
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: Look, there's so many of us trying to stick together. We even have kids. We came here a few months ago to work in the Grand Knight Territory. We lived in the city before that.
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: There are swarms of Gloompincers not far from here, and we don't have enough food on us... Plus, if a Catastrophe happens...
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: Don't cry. Your tears mean nothing to these cold-blooded assholes.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I... I used to look up to you people as heroes, thinking you were different from those ungrateful bastards in the General Chamber of Commerce––
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Your identification codes show that you don't belong in Kawalerielki.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Yes, you already said that.
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: But today alone, we went to the other cities, and all three of them said the same thing when they turned us away at the gates.
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: They said we were under the 'Grand Knight Territory' during the Kawalerielki Alliance, but now that the Major is over, starting today, the Kawalerielki Alliance... is no more!
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: So what that means is you expect us to wander the wilderness for three whole years before we can return to the city?!
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: ...I'll repeat myself again.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: You cannot enter Kawalerielki unless you have permission.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: In other words, as soon as the Major is over, the Grand Knight Territory no longer has any use for our cheap labor––
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: And we deserve to be left behind, thrown away just like the rubbish from the four cities after they separate?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: No, I refuse to accept that!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Take one step forward and I will consider it an illegal breach of the checkpoint.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Hah... Haha... and if I did step forward, what would the lot of you do, huh?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: The heroes of Kazimierz, our campaign knights... Would you run your lances through the hearts of your fellow people?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Or–– have we, the Infected, stopped being your fellow Kazimierzians altogether?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: There is no need for me to answer your question, Infected.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: If you don't turn back this instant––
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: I think there's still room to turn this situation around.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You're... the Radiant Knight?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Why would the Radiant Knight be...?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Oh, it's Margaret.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: It is, Uncle Liam. We meet again.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Honestly, I never expected to meet you under these circumstances.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: During the separation of the four cities, we were ordered to take over the job of securing Kawalerielki.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: ...Securing?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Prior to this Major, the campaign knights hadn't shown themselves in Kawalerielki for a very long time, let alone an entire squad of Silverlances guarding the entrance to a city.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Do these Infected... threaten the safety of Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret... You know the answer.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: You two... know each other?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hah... How stupid of me... You're the Radiant Knight of the Nearl family!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I used to worship you. I used to think you'd bring light to us Infected...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: But now? We see you for the imposter you are. Traitor to the Infected. Are you going to stand with that campaign knight and point the tip of your spear at us?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Sir, whether or not you trust me, please take your companions and rest over there for a while.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'll handle things over here.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Rest?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Sure then. Let's see what kind of show you're going to put on. Right here... with no cameras or spectators!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Margaret, they don't see you the way you see them.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: ...I've always known that.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But, in my eyes, the Infected are not Kazimierz's enemies. They are just... ordinary people, who've had to endure extraordinary suffering.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: And from your answer–– I can already guess the attitude of the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: However, Uncle Liam, this is a question I will ask again and again... And if necessary, I shall ask it with my swordspear.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: 'Do the Infected threaten the safety of Kazimierz?'
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: All units, stand down and return to your positions!
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Margaret, raise your weapon. You should already know how knights get their point across.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Uncle Liam, how long has it been since we last dueled?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Grandmaster, the four cities will be completely separated by around ten o'clock tonight.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: At present, all entrances to Kawalerielki, as well as all key facilities around the city, are secured by our knights.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: How long has it been since we've laid our eyes on this scenery?
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: We owe it all to young Margaret.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Speaking of Margaret... Grandmaster, will she agree to your proposal? After all, she has already turned us down several times.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Times are changing. Children these days see things more clearly than we did back then.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: She will see things clearly–– and she can still stand on our side without being a Silverlance.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Yes, we all hope to fight side-by-side with a Nearl, no matter which field. This has never changed.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: ...field.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: In the aftermath of the Major, the General Chamber of Commerce's concession was only temporary. We... No, the very future of Kazimierz... requires Margaret's power.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: And if she wants to continue moving forward, she also needs us.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Indeed... She does have a long road ahead of her.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: You all saw what her last act was during the Major.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: So you mean, that batch of Infected stranded in the desert... I see. That's why you'll have Liam handle this?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Liam was the one who volunteered.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Standing on the sidelines of the arena, he might say he has nothing but contempt for the hypocritical games. But in reality, he misses his first duel with Margaret.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: You're sure that Margaret will draw her weapon?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Without a doubt.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Otherwise, her name would not be Margaret Nearl.
attributes.name: Ioleta Russell

attributes.content: Let's see how much you've changed over the years––
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Standing before a true knight's lance is nothing like the mock-play in the arena. Nor is it like dealing with riffraff in the wastelands.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Uncle Liam.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'll always remember how you taught me to wield a spear on the battlefield when I was still very young.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: 'When a knight charges, he fights to defend every yard of soil beneath his feet.'
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: All these years, I've never stopped charging forward.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It takes more than words.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: My spear will speak in my stead and tell you everything I have to say.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Let's get started.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Under the sunlight, the silver of the lance's tip glows faintly with no air of pretense. It has been darkened by the erosion of wind and soil.
The golden light flowing from the blade of the swordspear gradually dims until the only bit of the eternal radiance that remains is the spark collected in the young pegasus's eyes.
Charge. Sweep. Feint. Thrust. Block.
Their actions seem to blur into one, at a speed hardly distinguishable to the naked eye.
Absent is any glow of Arts. The only light comes from the clashing of the two adamantine stars as they collide in the wastes.
Is that all you've got? You've gotten slow, Margaret!
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Huff...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: In battle, you get only a split second to land a decisive blow!
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: ...*cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: (Is this... a duel between campaign knights? It's nothing like brawls in the arena.)
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: (They're kicking up dust everywhere! Even standing at this distance... I can... barely catch my breath...)
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: They're clearly... not even using... any Arts... Urk...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Haven't you learned to watch out for yourself first? Margaret, you have your eyes on too many others. You're full of openings!
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Uncle Liam...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I disagree.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: This light...
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: You not only blocked my lance, but also...
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: I advance, I burn brightly, solely for the purpose of illuminating others.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Ugh––!
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: The Silverlance Pegasus takes a step back.
But this single step is enough to determine the victor.
I... can breathe again... Are they done fighting?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: And this light in front of me... this warmth... Wait, are you using the light to cover us from the sand kicked up by the duel?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: She's still the same Radiant Knight as always, isn't she? She never turned her back on the Infected! She swings her blade for us, and she lifts her shield to cover us!
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: So... that's how it is...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight... The Radiant Knight!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You really have grown, Margaret.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Uncle Liam. You didn't use any Arts, and I wasn't going to use mine––
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Nobody ever stipulated that campaign knights cannot use their Arts during a duel.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Furthermore, you are no campaign knight, Margaret.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: I've seen your feats in the arena.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Haven't you always looked down on the knight competitions?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've always had contempt for those hypocritical performances, until now.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: You fought well, Margaret.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: And the show you put on in the arena... was not the full extent of your power.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Is that... a compliment? Thank you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You've defeated me, once again. Ten years ago, you were already almost unstoppable.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: And now, you've perfected your techniques and your Arts. A spear that can control its own sharpness far exceeds your prior abilities, as well as what I am capable of.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: But even if I've won...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That's right, Margaret. Even if you've won, so what?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: I asked you to lift your weapon. And so you did. You came here prepared to fight. But... have you thought about what comes next?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: We made no agreement.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: I never once thought that a single victorious duel would make a Silverlance Pegasus yield to me.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Even if I let those Infected into the city...
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: What does that mean for them afterwards? How should Kawalerielki accept them, and how are they to survive in Kawalerielki?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: It's not as if I haven't given these things any thought, Uncle Liam.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Reality... is not a game. The day won't abruptly end, nor will there be a clear-cut winner.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So, I've made up my mind––
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Yesterday, I received a letter from the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi. It credited the Kazimierz Alliance Medical Organization for the Treatment of Infected with substantial contributions to the Major.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Under significant pressure from people of all walks of life, the Adeptus considered allowing this organization to continue working in Kazimierz, and established a special regulatory agency.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: And this organization... needs someone who can work closely with both sides to serve as a bridge.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret, are you saying...?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Please inform the Grand Knight that I will take this position.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret, did you decide all this before you chose to fight me?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But I also believed you'd want me to demonstrate my determination.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hah... Haha... You really have changed.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: In the past, you only knew how to charge ahead, alone, consuming yourself in your own radiance––
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: When did you learn to take all these other things into consideration?
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: While I was thinking about how to save people.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: During my years of exile, I made some friends who weren't the mightiest of warriors, but had hearts no less sincere than that of any knight.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I may not ever become as thorough and thoughtful as they are.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But I do hope... that my light can illuminate lands far and wide.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: To this end, I'm willing to learn some new things.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Excellent.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Those companions of yours must be very trusty indeed.
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: All units––
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Allow these Infected persons to enter the city! For the time being, custody over these individuals will be transferred to Margaret Nearl!
attributes.name: 'A Silverlance Pegasus

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: They're letting us in...? This... Thank you so much, Radiant Knight! You're a lifesaver!
attributes.name: An Infected Woman

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I don't know... if we can trust you. You helped us, but what good does it do? After all the hardships we've endured to return to Kawalerielki, what kind of life awaits us?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: ...I have no answers for you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but.. I can't make you any promises. Not now, maybe not even for the foreseeable future.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But, what I can say for sure is, I won't ever stop.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The long and difficulty journey you'll have to face... is the territory I've sworn to defend.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Radiant Knight–– Have you finished going over all the paperwork?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes, I've read them all, Mr. Spokesman.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I resigned from that position. You can just call me Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Alright, assistant to the chairman of the Rose Paper Union–– Mr. Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I thought this would be a simple interview. I never expected that you'd be waiting for me here.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A simple interview? Hardly. After you won the Major, you refused to speak with the press. This will be the first time you've been willing to face the camera––
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: As someone who has just stepped into the media industry, how could I miss such a rare opportunity?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The interview is just a means to an end.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm here to express my gratitude to you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Gratitude? Oh, I see now. You're talking about the report published regarding the settlement of the Infected following the Major? That was nothing more than a minor publication in an inconspicuous weekly medical journal.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...Mhm.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But I must say, I was rather surprised.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: By what? That we'd report on the plight of the Infected?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I didn't think you'd mention the Infected at all when it's not necessary, whether positively or negatively.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I understand that not everything between us is water under the bridge.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But things always change. As you may know, during the Major, I had a rather fruitful relationship with the leaders of Rhodes Island––
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: So, why would you rule out the possibility that there might be a spark of friendship between us?
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: After all, we both share the hope for Kazimierz to have a better tomorrow.
attributes.name: Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Margaret looks at the chairman's assistant's extended hand and hesitates for a moment before shaking it.
This hand does not belong to a knight. It does not sport the callouses of someone who has been honed. It does not have the power to move mountains and split rocks.
––But it runs very hot.
That temperature seems to set the warrior's blood alight almost instantly.
Margaret knows this sensation. Every time she stepped onto the field, every time she stood in the middle of the arena, she felt a similar excitement.
Perhaps some day in the future, Kazimierz too would be filled with this coursing, imperceptible flame.
Yes...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: To a better tomorrow.
attributes.name: Margaret
